label: interfaceEquipment
comment: An interface between an OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer) equipment and this monitoring IOT device.

rangeIncludes.comment: A necessary item or object for a particular purpose.

domainIncludes.comment: An object or system made or adapted for an IOT (Internet of Things) purpose such as to collect, report and autonomously transmit digital data especially when connected to a piece of mechanical or electronic equipment.
